attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: GRANT FREE VAT FUEL( GAS AND ELECTRIC ) FOR PENSIONERS IN THEIR OWN HOMES. IT WOULD GO A LITTLE WAY TO HELP.

rejection.details:
Your title should be a call for action, not a statement.

There are similar petitions eg. http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/fuelreductions/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
